== MainInclusionReportSg3-utils ==

== Main inclusion report for sg3-utils ==

Author: Mario Limonciello

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/

2. ''Rationale:'' This package is needed by the latest sync from debian of gtkpod to build properly.

3. ''Security:''
* No CAN Advisories
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: Provides command line utilities for manipulating the "sg" device driver as well as libraries to link against.
* Bugs: 
** No bugs in Ubuntu Launchpad (https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/sg3-utils/)
** 2 outstanding bugs in debian.  Neither are "major" bugs. (http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?which=src&data=sg3-utils&archive=no&version=&dist=unstable)
 
5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:'' 
* chrpath (main)
* libtool (main)

=== Reviewers ===

MartinPitt: harmless, approved
